author: Sophmxoxo
title: Ideal hotel
text:
The hotel is located around a 2 minute walk from the nearest metro station. You do need to get on the metro to get more in the centre (unless you really do not mind walking) however this was not a problem for my boyfriend or I as the metro is very quick and easy. It's just a few stops from a more central location. The area felt very safe and quiet.
The hotel itself in my opinion was lovely. I cannot fault it and it's just what you need for a city break.
